SEARCH
Package hms.boundary.patient.appointment

Class CancelAppointmentView

java.lang.Object
hms.boundary.View
hms.boundary.patient.appointment.AppointmentView
hms.boundary.patient.appointment.CancelAppointmentView
public class CancelAppointmentView extends AppointmentView
The CancelAppointmentView class extends AppointmentView to provide functionality for canceling appointments. It includes methods to display scheduled appointments for cancellation, confirm cancellation, and handle scenarios with no appointments available.

  • Method Details

    • displayAppointments

      public int displayAppointments(Patient patient, DoctorRepository doctorRepository)
      Displays the list of appointments for the specified patient, allowing them to select one for cancellation.
      Overrides:
      displayAppointments in class AppointmentView
      Parameters:
      patient - the patient whose appointments are displayed.
      doctorRepository - the repository to fetch doctor information for the appointments.
      Returns:
      the index of the appointment to cancel (0-based), or -1 if an invalid choice is made.
